description:
Just like the classic, these All Terrain crocs are easy to clean, easy to get on little feet and easy to love. Covered with a groovy topographic print, these Crocs have been upgraded with adjustable heel strap and a lugged outsole, great for little explorers that want to check out the paths less travelled.

  • Lightweight Croslite™ closed-cell resin upper
  • Water-friendly and buoyant, with venting ports to drain water
  • Contoured footbed for comfort and support
  • Pivoting adjustable heel strap provides a secure fit
  • Rugged Croslite™ lugs for increased traction
  • Customizable with Jibbitz™ charms (not included)
name: Crocs All Terrain Topographic Clogs - Children to Youths
